trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Palm Bay
There were no other sightings in Palm Bay on or around November 8th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI RECEIVED A CALL FROM A FRIEND IN FLORIDA, WHO LIVES EAST COAST SOUTH OF THE CAPE, HALF WAY DOWN THE STATE, TWO EVENINGS IN A ROW, "HUGE" DONUT SHAPED OBJECT ABOVE NORMAL FLIGHT OF PASSENGER JETS. DON'T KNOW HOW HIGH UP. DOESN'T MOVE...SECOND NIGHT NOT QUITE IN THE SAME LOCATION AS PREVIOUS NIGHT. LIGHTS ON ONE END, I BELIEVE HE SAID RED AND WHITE AND ONE WHITE GLOWING LIGHT FROM CENTER. OBJECT VERY CLEAR IN THE SKY. NOTHING MENTIONED ON NEWS. I ASKED HIM TO FILM IF HE SEES IT ON THE 9TH. This is all I have for now. Didn't now if anyone else reported this. Thank you
